name: 1 minute paper
subject: DDAISA-22AD2001A 2023-24 Even Semester
description: In one minute, describe the ways in which Artificial Intelligence impacts and enhances our daily lives. Highlight specific examples of how AI technologies contribute to convenience, efficiency, and innovation in various aspects of our everyday routines.

name: 1 Minute paper
subject: DDAISA-22AD2001A 2023-24 Even Semester
description: In one minute, briefly outline the main concepts of machine learning and provide examples of at least two types of machine learning techniques. Highlight the practical applications of each type in different domains. Be concise and focus on key ideas.
